about.description:
The mesoscale hydrologic model (mHM) is a spatially explicit distributed
hydrologic model that uses grid cells as a primary hydrologic unit
and accounts for the following processes: canopy interception,
snow accumulation and melting, soil moisture dynamics, infiltration and surface runoff,
evapotranspiration, subsurface storage and discharge generation,
deep percolation and baseflow and discharge attenuation and flood routing.

The mesoscale hydrologic model (mHM) is a spatially explicit distributed
hydrologic model that uses grid cells as a primary hydrologic unit
and accounts for the following processes: canopy interception,
snow accumulation and melting, soil moisture dynamics, infiltration and surface runoff,
evapotranspiration, subsurface storage and discharge generation,
deep percolation and baseflow and discharge attenuation and flood routing.

name: mhm

about.description:
The mesoscale hydrologic model (mHM) is a spatially explicit distributed
hydrologic model that uses grid cells as a primary hydrologic unit
and accounts for the following processes: canopy interception,
snow accumulation and melting, soil moisture dynamics, infiltration and surface runoff,
evapotranspiration, subsurface storage and discharge generation,
deep percolation and baseflow and discharge attenuation and flood routing.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mhm" %}
{% set version = "5.11.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://git.ufz.de/{{ name }}/{{ name }}/-/archive/v{{ version }}/{{ name }}-v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cd63882b74d7f808eca029bd4b8a986174c72329e50b957e7f50b0c81bd503f3

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - llvm-openmp  # [osx]
    - libgomp      # [linux]

  host:
    - netcdf-fortran

  run:
    - netcdf-fortran

test:
  source_files:
    - mhm.nml
    - mhm_outputs.nml
    - mhm_parameter.nml
    - mrm_outputs.nml
    - test_domain
    - test_domain_2

  commands:
    - mhm

about:
  home: https://www.ufz.de/mhm
  license: LGPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'The mesoscale Hydrological Model - mHM'
  description: |
    The mesoscale hydrologic model (mHM) is a spatially explicit distributed
    hydrologic model that uses grid cells as a primary hydrologic unit
    and accounts for the following processes: canopy interception,
    snow accumulation and melting, soil moisture dynamics, infiltration and surface runoff,
    evapotranspiration, subsurface storage and discharge generation,
    deep percolation and baseflow and discharge attenuation and flood routing.
  doc_url: https://mhm.pages.ufz.de/mhm
  dev_url: https://git.ufz.de/mhm/mhm

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MuellerSeb
    - StephanThober
    - mhm-admin
